text: I don't think I've ever sat down and
written a song and immediately had tears
welling up in my eyes afterwards right
and to know its profound effect on me in
my life and I don't think I'm alone in
that feeling and I think that the
numbers kind of say that tell that same
story can you listen to it was a two
point you know the first time I played
it for my family I actually broke down
and I just hell man I played it for my
mom and I could see the look in her eye
it was just a really powerful thing I
got to play it for my friends and I got
to play for my best friend's family who
they lost his their son and and it's
just it's an incredible thing to have
look back and say you know I made music
for the club and I made music for radio
but I actually made music that that
mattered you know the loved ones uh her
loved one hip for my best friend
for Carly's friend for Paul Walker for
everyone else who's out there struggling
I just I hope it continues to bring hope
and and just change people lies and let
them know that there's something bigger
out there
